agreement_acceptance.summary: DEADBEAT: Here. Tomorrow. Skinny nods, Okay, go. But the guy doesn’t go. (agreement acceptance)

air_travel_or_flight.summary: air travel or flight in CONCRETE PLANT - BALTIMORE: Frank pulls the rig onto the grounds of the plant. There’s a little landing strip next to it.

air travel or flight in MICHIGAN: The plane descends over the north shore of Lake Erie. Lands on the Pontiac Airfield. The pilot lowers the steps and Frank climbs out and walks to a parked Fo...

answer_response.summary: BUFALINO: Or on the highway. Carrie isn’t having it; snaps open her little gold lamé cigarette clutch. She cracks the window. Russell glances over at Frank t... (answer response)
FRANK: I don’t know. Sounds funny. Frank runs the engine manually from under the hood as Russell listens. (answer response)
JOHNNY: He used to work at a butcher shop. (answer response)

apology_or_regret.summary: JUDGE: Not you, Mr. Sheeran. The plaintiff. You bring another workingman before this court with threats instead of evidence, believe me, you’ll be sorry.... (apology or regret)
GROCER: Frank, I’m sorry, but your kid was out of line. I only did what you and your wife should have done at home. Frank pulls the Grocer clear over the c... (apology or regret)
BUFALINO: Tell Jimmy I’m sorry for his troubles, but if worse comes to worst, the old timers know the father. They talk... and they could straighten things out. (apology or regret)

arrival.summary: arrival in FRANK & MARY’S HOUSE: Frank comes in to find Mary cooking and his daughter Peggy sulking.
arrival in BANK: He comes in on his canes. Stands in a short line. Looks around like he’s casing the place. Makes it to the front, but lets someone go ahead of him so he can...

bar or social drinking in THE FRIENDLY LOUNGE: Frank and Johnny standing at Skinny’s table.
bar or social drinking in THE FRIENDLY LOUNGE: Skinny regards the guy standing before him.

cash payment or side deal in HOFFA'S OFFICE - ANTEROOM: Frank and Bill open a large ebony credenza with an elaborate Chinese design. Bill opens the credenza to reveal stacks of cash in neat bank banded units readi...

court appearance in COURTROOM - NASHVILLE: With the jury out of the room, attorney Bill Bufalino - the same Teamster attorney who represented Frank in his trucking theft case - appeals to Judge Willia...

deference_signal.summary: deference signal in MELROSE DINER - PHILLY - DAY - LATE FALL 1958: Frank sits at a table with a cup of coffee when Whispers DiTullio sits down. Frank nods.

delivery_or_transport_job.summary: delivery or transport job in MEAT COMPANY: It’s summer. As loading dock workers in short sleeves carry hindquarters and hang them in Frank’s refrigerated truck, he signs for the load - 25 beef carcasses.

delivery or transport job in MEAT COMPANY - CONTINUOUS - DEC. 1956: Frank emerges from the office, crosses the freezing cold dock, shuts the doors of the loaded truck but pockets the seal instead of putting it on the lock.

departure.summary: departure in THE LATIN CASINO: Jerry Vale’s singing ‘Spanish Eyes’ as couples dance. Jimmy’s dancing with Frank’s daughter Peggy, and each time they turn, she looks over at - Russell and S...

domestic routine in FRANK & MARY’S HOUSE: Frank takes five hundred from the $2000 stack of bills in the envelope and gives the rest to Mary, at the kitchen table with their three girls.

drive_or_vehicle_travel.summary: drive or vehicle travel in FRANK’S LINCOLN - WILKES-BARRE: Frank drives along a city street with Russell in front, the women in back, Carrie putting on some lipstick.

drive or vehicle travel in RURAL PENNSYLVANIA: The road ahead as the Lincoln drives a rural stretch of I-80 West.

FRANK (IN SYNC): Bill Bufalino’s daughter was getting married in Detroit. Frank puts the watch on his wrist. The gold ring is on his finger next to his wedding band... (explanation account)

family interaction in BEAUTY PARLOR - DETROIT: Several women sitting under hair dryers. One of the women is Jimmy’s wife, Josephine.
family interaction in DOLORES’S HOUSE - PHILLY: Frank sits with one of his other daughters - Dolores - now in her 40s.

PRIEST: I can come see you again if you want, after the Christmas holidays. (farewell or closing)

CHUCKIE: Hi. Hi, Frank. (greeting or opening)

hearing_or_committee_session.summary: hearing or committee session in SENATE CHAMBERS: Bobby Kennedy regards Hoffa like he’s an insect. It’s ten minutes into the hearing now -

instruction_order.summary: BRUNO: Sit down, Frank. Frank sits. Listens to a silence before - (instruction order)

insult_or_disrespect.summary: BUFALINO: Son of a bitch. (insult or disrespect)

introduction.summary: HOFFA: Hiya, Frank. This is Jimmy Hoffa. Glad to meet you, even over the phone. (introduction)

prison confinement life in LEWISBURG FEDERAL PENITENTIARY: The black bus pulls past the gates of the penitentiary.
prison confinement life in LEWISBURG PENITENTIARY: Jimmy Hoffa - Inmate No. 33298-NE - is fingerprinted and photographed and given a blue denim prison uniform.

promise_or_vow.summary: BUFALINO: Carrie - I made a vow. (promise or vow)
DEADBEAT: Tomorrow. I swear. (promise or vow)

public_event_or_rally.summary: public event or rally in VILLA ROMANO BAR: As Pro walks into the crowded place, his Teamster workingmen supporters cheer him, wave “Vote TONY ‘PRO’ and Slate” signs, bang on drink trays.

public_speech_or_address.summary: GALLO: (laughs) So he’s a boss. So am I a boss. We’re all supposed to be brothers. (public speech or address)

question.summary: CARRIE: And I can’t smoke in the car? (question)
FRANK: You see where we are? (question)

refusal.summary: CARRIE: You won’t stop on the highway. (refusal)
BUFALINO: This fix won’t last forever. Russell wipes his hands on a rag and heads off. (refusal)
BILL: Then no. They regard each other. (refusal)

religious_ritual.summary: religious ritual in MOTHER OF SORROWS CHURCH: A priest performs a baptism. Frank and his first wife Mary’s second daughter, Peggy. There are so few people in attendance, it seems like a private ceremony....

request.summary: SKINNY: Don’t tell me, let me guess. His mother died and the funeral set him back. (request)
WHISPERS: And remember, please! This is between us. Don’t mention nothing to nobody, even Skinny. That’s why I didn’t wanna borrow the ten grand off the street. (request)
HOFFA: He’s not an easy man to please. (request)
